versions.localizedDescription: Geode iOS development release for commit b9119f6b892d96982c7fef87790b394a46053afa.

## Changelog
- Fixed StikJIT and other apps not opening automatically when pressing launch

View the [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/blob/main/INSTALL.md) guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

Finally at **v1.0.0**! This adds a new icon to celebrate Pride Month, fixes bugs, and more!

## Changelog
- Added icon selection
- Added **Pride Month** icon
- Added a warning if you launch Geode with JIT without having it launch in the containerized Geometry Dash (Mainly for those that think they need to **always** launch Geode with JIT when that isn't the case) (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/35)
- Fixed bug with JIT enabler crashing on iPad when tapped on (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/37)
- Fixed bug with the launcher not knowing if Geode dylib is up to date or not (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/36)
- Fixed bug with not being able to exit settings if you're on landscape rotation in iPhone (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/47)
- Fixed Trollstore version of the launcher not rendering color wheel (uses image instead)
- Fixed issue with color selection being impossible to exit on iPad

View the [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/blob/main/INSTALL.md) guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.5.1...v1.0.0

## Changelog
- Added Trollstore warning to tell you to enable "URL Scheme" in settings
- Removed Nightly being enabled by default
- Added landscape rotation support for phones
- Fixed bug where cancelling the update early for Geode will assume Geode was updated for nightly releases
- Fixed Trollstore version of the launcher crashing when going to color picker

**Expect bugs!**

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

## Changelog
- Replaced Auto JIT with **JIT Enabler**
  - **JIT Enabler** allows you to choose how you launch Geode with JIT!
  - If some options are missing or none of the options work for you, simply use "Manual reopen with JIT".
- Added a redirect button if a launcher update is available
- Added an update check to the setup process
- Added a check to TrollStore version if the documents folder can be found
- Allowed uploading multiple mods in web server
- Added custom launch arguments (For Developers)
- Added an indicator for when app logs will clear
- Allowed opening .geode files to import mods
- Fixed automatic launch soft-locking when you go to settings
- Fixed IPA extraction failure bug (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/15)
- Fixed SideStore deactivation permission bug (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/20, https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/22)
- Fixed issue with documents folder in TrollStore version of the launcher sometimes not being found

**Expect bugs!**

Do NOT ask for help for the launcher. This is meant for developer use only.

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

## Changelog
- Added LiveContainer Support (Experimental)
  - For LiveContainer, you **must** enable the following in the app settings:
  - `Launch with JIT`
  - `Don't Inject TweakLoader`
  - `Don't Load TweakLoader`
- Added more logging to launch process
- Removed "Use Tweak instead of JIT" option (Checks if you're using the TIPA version instead)
- Fixed credits footer placement
- Fixed app logs logging in GD documents directory

**Expect bugs!**

Do NOT ask for help for the launcher. This is meant for developer use only.

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.3.2...v0.4.0

## Changelog
- Fix Trollstore version from not installing Geode correctly if Geode has never been installed before

**Expect bugs!**

Do NOT ask for help for the launcher. This is meant for developer use only.

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.3.1...v0.3.2

## Changelog
- Added Auto JIT back

**Expect bugs!**

Do NOT ask for help for the launcher. This is meant for developer use only.

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

## Changelog
* Added overriding the theme for Geode in settings (System, Light, Dark)
* Disabled Auto JIT due to many people misunderstanding it (Use StikJIT instead!)
* Added live-refreshing logs to web server
* Allowed web server to be running even when Geometry Dash is running (IPA version only)
* Fixed import IPA from not importing if GD isn't verified
* Fixed web server not replacing Geode.ios.dylib
* Fixed sideloadly not being able to sideload Geode (https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/issues/7)
* Add documentation about building on Linux (by @Soccera1 in https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/pull/8)
* Add warning for sideloaders that use enterprise certificates (by @slideglide in https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/pull/11)

## New Contributors
* @Soccera1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/pull/8
* @slideglide made their first contribution in https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/pull/11

**Expect bugs!**

Do NOT ask for help for the launcher. This is meant for developer use only.

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

## Changelog
- Added update checker for pre-release (will be reverted after stable release)
- Changed the geode version to use the one in saved files
- Fixed Entitlements for TrollStore version
- Changed JIT failure text
- Changed Warning text
- Fixed Automatic Updating for Nightly
- Fix bug with Developer Setting Buttons not working properly

**Expect bugs!**

Do NOT ask for help for the launcher. This is meant for developer use only.

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

## Initial release

Expect bugs!

Do NOT ask for help for the launcher. This is meant for developer use only.

View the INSTALL.md guide on installing.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/geode-sdk/ios-launcher/commits/v0.1.0

news.title: Geode is on iOS (for developers)!
news.caption: Geode, has come to iOS! Now with a AltSource! Keep in mind the launcher is in the pre-release stage, meaning that it's not ready for normal use.

news.title: Geode is on iOS!
news.caption: Geode has come to iOS on SideStore!

news.title: Hello Soggy Mod Users!
news.caption: You may have noticed that our name has changed and our logo is more vibrant than usual. To celebrate the pride year, we have changed our logo and name to be gayer than ever before. Thank you for your understanding, stay modding!
